pcadapt
  • Overview
  • Documentation
  • Articles

Display PCA with pcadapt

library(pcadapt)
file <- read.pcadapt("geno3pops", type = "example")
x <- pcadapt(file, K = 5)
## Reading file /Users/luuk/Library/R/3.4/library/pcadapt/extdata/geno3pops.pcadapt...
## Number of SNPs: 1500
## Number of individuals: 150

Basic display 

plot(x, option = "scores")

Add colors 

ind.label <- c(rep("AFR", 50), rep("EUR", 50), rep("ASN", 50))
plot(x, option = "scores", pop = ind.label)

Custom colors 

ind.label <- c(rep("AFR", 50), rep("EUR", 50), rep("ASN", 50))
custom.colors <- c("#999999", "#E69F00", "#56B4E9")
plot(x, option = "scores", pop = ind.label, gg.col = custom.colors)
